snippet: Hafiz Khan, the imam of a mosque in Miami, was found guilty of two counts of conspiracy and two counts of providing material support to terrorists.
abstract: Federal court in Miami finds Hafiz Khan, imam of small mosque in working-class neighborhood there, guilty of providing thousands of dollars of support to Pakistani Taliban; Khan faces maximum 15-year prison sentence for each of two counts of conspiracy and two counts of providing material support to terrorists.
lead_paragraph: Hafiz Khan, the imam of a mosque in Miami, was found guilty of two counts of conspiracy and two counts of providing material support to terrorists.

headline.seo: Miami Imam, Found Guilty of Supporting Pakistani Taliban
headline.main: Miami Imam Sent Money to Terrorists, Jury Finds
headline.print_headline: Miami Imam Sent Money to Terrorists, Jury Finds
